title: Files of a Sex Therapist...Subject: Garrett Connors
description: Dr. Olivia Russo is a successful sex therapist with clients from every walk of life. Her specialty is alternative lifestyles and modification; kink, fetish and especially BDSM. Her high-rise in Manhattan has a penthouse...with a very secret tenant. Club Leather and Lace. Entrance is by private invitation only...the owner...Mistress Olivia. "Why the penthouse and not the basement? I don’t like the connotation that comes with an underground club. There is nothing seedy about Leather & Lace. It is where adults play…adult games." Read Files of a Sex Therapist...Subject Garrett Connors by Wendy Jay. Delve into this unusual doctor's life. Meet Dr. Russo's friends,love interest and patients. Garrett Connors; the first patient you're introduced too has a dark, sexual side not to be denied; and he wants the good doctor for his own...and he will do anything to have her. This is book one in the series.
author: Wendy Jay
